  • Sell With Us

Sell Your Property in 3 Easy Steps.

Discoverize is making it simpler to sell your home and move forward.

1

Request an Offer

Tell us about your home and answer a few questions. It takes less than 5 minutes.

2

Do a video walkthrough

Show us your home so we can make our best offer that guaranteed will satisfy you.

3

Close and move, stress-free

Choose when you want to close, when to move, and you will get paid within days.

Request an Offer

Tell us about your home and answer a few questions. It takes less than 5 minutes..

Competitive Cash offer

Sell directly to us and get paid in 24 hours, so you’ll have the cash you need to buy your next home.

Skip staging and showings

Do a video walkthrough and skip the showings. If repairs are needed, you can let us handle the work.

Choose your closing date

With Discoverize, you can pick any date to work with your schedule up to 90 days after you accept our offer.

Extended Stay

No need to close and move on the same day or move twice if your new home isn’t ready so you don’t have to rush.
